output.ticket:
<%

            //Productos
            var strMesaCarrionMay = 'F8771274FB3840B680E22DB61237F204'; 
            var strMesaCarrionBuff = '432498A662DA45C29E378A34BCB00145';
            console.log( user.isDomicilie);
            
            
            if(!user.isDomicilie){
%>


                  
                  
                      <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_title') %>
                  
          <%
            }else{          
          %>      
          
                  
                      <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_titleDomicilie') %>
                      

<%
            }
%>


    <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Documentno') + ' ' +  OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('documentNo') )   %>



    <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_BoxNumber') + ' ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('posTerminal'+OB.Constants.FIELDSEPARATOR + OB.Constants.IDENTIFIER))  %>



    <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Date')) %>
    <%= OB.I18N.formatDate(order.get('orderDate')) + '  ' %>
    <%= OB.I18N.formatHour(order.get('orderDate')) %>
  


      
    
    <% 
      
    var line, promotions;      
    var lines = [];      
    _.each(order.get('lines').models, function (line) {        
    var clonedLine = new OB.Model.OrderLine(line.attributes);        
    lines.push(clonedLine);      });      
    var finalLines = [];
    
    var totaltax = 0;
    var totalnotax = 0;
    var totalpvp = 0;
    var qtyprod=0;
    var nameproductMain ='';
    var printProductMainObject;
    var indxProm=0;
    var flagProm='false';
    var productoPromocion ='';
    var productNameOld='';
    
    var promocionOld='';
    
    
    var comboID='';
    var comboOldID='1';
    for (var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++)
    {
        //line = lines.at(i);
        line = lines[i];

         
        //console.log("Linea Comanda"+ i);
       //console.log(line);
            
        var productName= line.get('product').get('_identifier');
        var pnameLength = productName.length;
        //console.log(productName );

    %>
    
       <%
       var countProm=0;
       var countPromociones2 =0;
       try{
            comboID = line.get('comboId');
            var objprom = line.get('promotions');
             countProm = objprom.length;

            if (countProm>0){
           
                if (indxProm==0){
                    indxProm =i;
                }
                
             var linep = lines[i];
             productNameOld= linep.get('product').get('_identifier');
                        
             printProductMainObject = line.get('promotions');
             nameproductMain = printProductMainObject[0].name; 
             countPromociones2 =  nameproductMain.length;
            
                console.log("****************");
                console.log("productNameOld: "+ productNameOld);
                console.log("nameproductMain: "+ nameproductMain);
                console.log("****************");

                                
                
                            
                if (productNameOld==nameproductMain){
                  %>
                    
                  <%
                  indxProm=0;
                }
            }
            
          }catch(err){
          }
          

          
          if (countPromociones2 ==0 ){

          }
          
             
                          
            if ( comboID != comboOldID){
                comboOldID = comboID ;
                console.log("       *******************Imprimir linea");
                %>
                       
                        ============================================
                      
                <%
            
            }
          
       %>
    
  
      <%
          var productoID = line.get('product').get('id');
          if (productoID!=strMesaCarrionBuff  &&  productoID!=strMesaCarrionMay){
      %>

  <%                            
        if (pnameLength>0){
      %>
            
      
          <%                    
                if(pnameLength >=34) 
                { %>
                    
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(0, 34) %>
                    
                <%
                
                }
                if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength>68) 
                { %>
                     
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                    
                
                <% }
                else if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength<=68) 
                {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                     
                 
                 <%
                 }
                 if (pnameLength>68)
                 {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(68, 34) %>
                         
                
                <%
                 }
                %>
                
                

                <%
                    if (pnameLength >0 && pnameLength<=33){
                %>
                       
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier'))  %>
                      
                <%
                }
                %> 
                
      <%
        }
      %>
      
      
        <%}else{%>

  <%                            
        if (pnameLength>0){
      %>
            
       
          <%                    
                if(pnameLength >=34) 
                { %>
                    
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(0, 34) %>
                    
                <%
                
                }
                if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength>68) 
                { %>
                     
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                    
                
                <% }
                else if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength<=68) 
                {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                     
                 
                 <%
                 }
                 if (pnameLength>68)
                 {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(68, 34) %>
                         
                
                <%
                 }
                %>
                
                

                <%
                    if (pnameLength >0 && pnameLength<=33){
                %>
                       
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier'))  %>
                      
                <%
                }
                %> 
                
      <%
        }
      %>
            
             
        <%}%>


              <%
                  var V_DES = line.get('description');
                  var desLength = line.get('description').length;
                  if (V_DES!=null && V_DES!=''){
              %>
              
              
                  <%                    
                        if(desLength >=34) 
                        { %>
                            
                                <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_SmallerThan')) +  OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(0, 34) %>
                            
                        <%
                        
                        }
                        if(desLength >34 && desLength>68) 
                        { %>
                            
                                    <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(34, 34) %>
                            
                        
                        <% }
                        else if(desLength >34 && desLength<=68) 
                        {
                         %>
                    
                            
                                    <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(34, 34) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_GreaterThan'))  %>
                             
                         
                         <%
                         }
                         if (desLength>68)
                         {
                         %>
                    
                            
                                    <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(68, 34) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_GreaterThan'))  %>
                                 
                        
                        <%
                         }
                        %>
                        
                        
        
                        <%
                        if (line.get('description').length >0 && line.get('description').length<=33){
                        %>
                               
                                <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_SmallerThan')) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_GreaterThan'))  %>
                              
                        <%
                        }
                        %> 
                        
              <%
                }
              %>

          
       <%
            try{
            var printProductMainObjectflag = line.get('promotions');
            //console.log(printProductMainObjectflag);
            
            if (printProductMainObjectflag){
                printProductMainObject = line.get('promotions');
   
                var countProductMain = printProductMainObject.length;
           
                nameproductMain = printProductMainObject[0].name;
                productoPromocion =    nameproductMain; 

                if (productName != nameproductMain)
                {
                               
      %>
                <%                  
                var countlettersProduct= nameproductMain.length;

                if(countlettersProduct >=32) 
                { 
                %>
                    
                        <%= '     --' + nameproductMain.substr(0, 32) %>
                    
                <%
                
                }
                if(countlettersProduct >32 && countlettersProduct>64) 
                { %>
                     
                            <%= '       ' + nameproductMain.substr(32, 32) %>
                    
                
                <% }
                else if(countlettersProduct >32 && countlettersProduct<=64) 
                {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '       ' + nameproductMain.substr(32, 32) %>
                     
                 
                 <%
                 }
                 if (countlettersProduct>64)
                 {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '       ' + nameproductMain.substr(62, 32) %>
                         
                
                <%
                 }
                %>
                
                

                <%
                    if (countlettersProduct >0 && countlettersProduct<=31){
                %>
                       
                        <%= '     --' + nameproductMain  %>
                      
                <%
                }
                %>  
      
      <%
                }

            }
            
            }catch(err){
            }

                                  
          
            
            
      %>
          
    <%
      }
    %> 
    
    
        ====================@=====================

<%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatOrg')) %>
    
    
            <%  
    var availableLines = 22;
    var dirORG = OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatDirection'));
    var dirLength = dirORG.length;
    if(dirLength >= 27)
    { %>
        
            <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Mat')) %>
            <%= dirORG.substr(0, 29) %>
         
        
            <%= dirORG.substr(29, dirORG.length ) %>
        
    <%
    
    }
    else
    { %>    
        
                <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Mat')) %>
                <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatDirection')) %>
        
    <% } %>
        

    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Suc')) %>
        <%
        var IdSUC = order.get('organization');
        var NameSuc ="";
        if (IdSUC = 'B0CF08F481A546B9AE007F5A558F3B3F'){
            NameSuc ='M1 - LA CARRION';
        }else if(IdSUC = '19234717EC114F99B0CEC61F7F49C4B8'){
            NameSuc ='BUFALOS';
        }else if(IdSUC = 'D0789F6E56324361A75EAB486F985FB0'){
            NameSuc ='MAYFLOWER';
        }else if(IdSUC = '44E8B952BC2B4CB085EF228F6D4E1EE9'){
            NameSuc ='B1 - MALL EL JARDIN';
        }else if(IdSUC = '219E891032134ED1A94D0F0B0ECEADC1'){
            NameSuc ='M2 - QUICENTRO SHOPPING';
        }else if(IdSUC = 'FC3F7EF376074B038F08C5CE0E93BF15'){
            NameSuc ='B1- EL CONDADO';
        }
        %>
        <%= ' ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent( user.org ) %>
        
    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatTaxpayer')) %>
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatTaxpayerNo')) %>
         
    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatAccounting')) %>
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatMsgConfirmation')) %>
       
    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatRUC')) %>
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_MatRucNo')) %>
     
    
            ********************************************
      
    

    <%
    var availableLines = 22;
    
    var clientLength = order.get('bp').get('_identifier').length;
    if(clientLength >= 27)
    { %>
        
            <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_Name')) %>
            <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('bp').get('_identifier')).substr(0, 27) %>
        
    
        
            <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('bp').get('_identifier')).substr(27, order.get('bp').get('_identifier').length ) %>
        
    <%
    
    }
    else
    { %>
        
                <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_Name')) %>
                <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('bp').get('_identifier')) %>
            
    <% } %>
        
           
    
      <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_TaxID')) %>
      <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('bp').get('taxID')) %>
    
    
    
      <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_Date')) %>
      <%= OB.I18N.formatDate(order.get('orderDate')) %>
      , 
      <%= OB.I18N.formatHour(order.get('orderDate')) %>
    

    <%
    var countAuth = order.get('validationCode');
    
    if (countAuth>0){
    %>
    
    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_CodeAuthorization')) %>
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('validationCode')).substr(0, 16)   %>
    
    
    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('validationCode')).substr(16, 33)   %>
    
    
    <%
    }else{
    
    %>
    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_CodeAuthorization')) %>
      
    
    <%
    }
    %>
    
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_InvoiceDocumentno')) %>
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('invoiceDocumentNo'))   %>
    
    
    
    
        ********************************************
     
    
        <%= '******* '+ OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Documentno')) %>
        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('documentNo')) +' *********'  %>
    
    
        ********************************************
     
            
    
    <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_Description'))%>
    <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_Qty'))%>
    <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_PVP'))%>
    <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent('  ')%> 
    <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_Total'))%>
    
    
    
            ============================================
    
    
    <% 
    var lines = [];      
    _.each(order.get('lines').models, function (line) {        
    var clonedLine = new OB.Model.OrderLine(line.attributes);        
    lines.push(clonedLine);      });
    var  line, promotions, auxLines;
    var finalLines = [];
    
    var totaltax = 0;
    var totalnotax = 0;
    var totalpvp = 0;
    var qtyprod=0;
    
   
    for (var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++)
    {
     
       //line = lines.at(i);
        line = lines[i];
        
         if (line.printNet()==0.00 ||  line.printNet()==0){
         //console.log("No imprime linea:  " + i );
            continue;
         }
        var listp=line.get('product').get('listPrice');
        
        console.log("Linea Factura: " + i);
        console.log(line);
    
        var qty = line.get('qty');
        qtyprod += qty;
        var totalpvpaux = listp * qty;
    %>
        
        
        <%
        var descLength = line.get('product').get('_identifier').length;
        if(descLength  >= 42)
        { %>
            
                <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier').replace(/"/g, '')).substr(0, 42) %>
            
    
            
                <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier').replace(/"/g, '')).substr(42, line.get('product').get('_identifier').length ) %>
                <%= line.printQty() %>
            
            <%
            if(!_.isUndefined(line.get('linerate')))
            {
                if(line.get('linerate')==1)
                {
            %>
                        <%
                        if(order.get('priceIncludesTax')) 
                        {
                            totalpvp += totalpvpaux;
                        %>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()/line.get('linerate')).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                        <%
                        } else 
                        {
                            var ltax = 1;
                            var tax = totalpvpaux * ltax;
                            totalpvp += tax;        
                        %>  
                        <%= (line.printPrice()*1).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                        <%}%>
                <% } else 
                { %>
                    
                    <%if(order.get('priceIncludesTax'))
                    {
                        totalpvp += totalpvpaux;%>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()/line.get('linerate')).toFixed(2)%>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent('*')%> 
                    <%} else
                    {
                        var ltax = 1;
                        var tax = totalpvpaux * ltax;
                        totalpvp += tax;
                    %>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()*1).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                    <%}%>
                <%}
            } else 
            { %>
                <%= (line.printPrice()*1).toFixed(2) %>
                <%if(order.get('priceIncludesTax'))
                {
                    totalpvp += totalpvpaux;%>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()/line.get('linerate')).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent('&')%>  
                <% } else
                {
                    var ltax = 1;
                    var tax = totalpvpaux * ltax;
                    totalpvp += tax;
                    %>
                    <%= line.printNet() %>
                <%}
            } %>

            
        <% 
        
        }
        else
        { %>
        
            <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier').replace(/"/g, '')) %>
        
        
            <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent('')%>
            <%= line.printQty() %>
            
            <%
            if(!_.isUndefined(line.get('linerate')))
            {
                if(line.get('linerate')==1)
                {
            %>
                        <%
                        if(order.get('priceIncludesTax')) 
                        {
                            totalpvp += totalpvpaux;
                        %>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()/line.get('linerate')).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                        <%
                        } else 
                        {
                            var ltax = 1;
                            var tax = totalpvpaux * ltax;
                            totalpvp += tax;        
                        %>  
                        <%= (line.printPrice()*1).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                        <%}%>
                <% } else 
                { %>
                    
                    <%if(order.get('priceIncludesTax'))
                    {
                        totalpvp += totalpvpaux;%>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()/line.get('linerate')).toFixed(2)%>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent('*')%> 
                    <%} else
                    {
                        var ltax = 1;
                        var tax = totalpvpaux * ltax;
                        totalpvp += tax;
                    %>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()*1).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= line.printNet() %>
                    <%}%>
                <%}
            } else 
            { %>
                <%= (line.printPrice()*1).toFixed(4) %>
                <%if(order.get('priceIncludesTax'))
                {
                    totalpvp += totalpvpaux;%>
                        <%= (line.printPrice()/line.get('linerate')).toFixed(2) %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent('&')%>  
                <% } else
                {
                    var ltax = 1;
                    var tax = totalpvpaux * ltax;
                    totalpvp += tax;
                    %>
                    <%= line.printNet() %>
                <%}
            } %>
        
        <% 
        
        }
        %>
     
        
    <%
    
    }
    
    var totAmount = 0;
    var totNet = 0;
    var totNoTax = 0;
    var totSub=0;
      var taxes = order.get('taxes');
      for (var t in taxes) {
    if(taxes[t].amount == 0){
    totNet += taxes[t].net;
    }else{
    totNoTax += taxes[t].net;
    }
        totAmount += taxes[t].amount;
      } 
    totSub=totNet+totNoTax;
    %>
    
    
            ============================================
    
    

      
        <%= OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_SubTotalTax') %>
        
        <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(totNoTax) %>  
      
      
        <%= OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_SubtotalNoTax') %>
        
        <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(totNet) %>  
      
      
        <%= OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_Subtotal') %>
        
        <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(totSub) %>  
      
      
        <%= OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_TotalTax') %>
        
        <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(totAmount) %>
      
    
      <%=OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_ReceiptTotal') + ' ' + order.get('currency' + OB.Constants.FIELDSEPARATOR + OB.Constants.IDENTIFIER) %>
      <%= order.printGross() %>
    
      <%
        var payments = order.get('payments');
        for (var i = 0; i < payments.length; i++) {
      if(payments.at(i).get('rate') && payments.at(i).get('rate')!=='1'){
      %>
        
          <%= payments.at(i).get('name') %>
          <%= '('+OB.I18N.formatCurrency(payments.at(i).get('amount'))+' '+payments.at(i).get('isocode')+')' %>
          <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(payments.at(i).get('origAmount')) %>
        
     <%
         }else {
     %>
        
          <%= payments.at(i).get('name') %>
          <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(payments.at(i).get('amount')) %>
        
      <%
        }}
    var rateaux = totalpvp-order.get('net');
    var rate = (rateaux/order.get('net'))*100;
    %>   
    
      <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_ticketChange')) %>
      <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(order.get('change'))%>
    
    
      <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('SSPOS_AtendBy')) + ' ' +  OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(  user.user) %>
    

    
        ============================================
    
    
    
     
       *********** DATOS DE ENTREGA **************
    
    
    
       <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(  order.get('addressDesc')) %> 
    
    <%

      if (order.get('description')){
         var descriptionToSplit = user.descriptionorder;
         //console.log( user.descriptionorder);
         var descsplitted = descriptionToSplit ;
         for (var i = 0; i < descsplitted.length; i++) {
            var descriptionToShow = descsplitted[i];
            
            
            var countDescription = descriptionToShow.length;
              //console.log( "*******contando");
              //console.log( countDescription);
              if( countDescription>40   ){
                for (var k=0; k < 4;k++){
                    //console.log( descriptionToShow);
                    var imprimirTexto = descriptionToShow.substr(0,40);
                    
                                        
                    //console.log( "*******IMPRIMIR");
                    //console.log( imprimirTexto);
                    
                    descriptionToShow = descriptionToShow.replace(imprimirTexto,"") ;
                    countDescription = descriptionToShow.length;

                    
                    //console.log( "*******contando 2");
                    //console.log( countDescription);
                    
                    if (imprimirTexto.length>0){
                   
                    
                    %>
                    
                       <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(  imprimirTexto )  %> 
                    
                    <%
                    
                     }
                }
              }else{
              
                    //console.log( "*******contando");
                    //console.log( countDescription);
                  %>
                  
                     <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(  descriptionToShow )  %> 
                  
                  <%              
              
              }
          }
         }
    %>
	
        Servicio a Domicilio no incluye bebidas

<%

            var strMesaCarrionMay = 'F8771274FB3840B680E22DB61237F204'; 
            var strMesaCarrionBuff = '432498A662DA45C29E378A34BCB00145';
            console.log( user.isDomicilie);
            
            
            if(!user.isDomicilie){
%>


                  
                  
                      <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_title') %>
                  
          <%
            }else{          
          %>      
          
                  
                      <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_titleDomicilie') %>
                      

<%
            }
%>


    <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Documentno') + ' ' +  OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('documentNo') )   %>



    <%- OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_BoxNumber') + ' ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order.get('posTerminal'+OB.Constants.FIELDSEPARATOR + OB.Constants.IDENTIFIER))  %>



    <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_Date')) %>
    <%= OB.I18N.formatDate(order.get('orderDate')) + '  ' %>
    <%= OB.I18N.formatHour(order.get('orderDate')) %>
  


      
    
    <% 
      
    var line, promotions;      
    var lines = [];      
    _.each(order.get('lines').models, function (line) {        
    var clonedLine = new OB.Model.OrderLine(line.attributes);        
    lines.push(clonedLine);      });      
    var finalLines = [];
    
    var totaltax = 0;
    var totalnotax = 0;
    var totalpvp = 0;
    var qtyprod=0;
    var nameproductMain ='';
    var printProductMainObject;
    var indxProm=0;
    var flagProm='false';
    var productoPromocion ='';
    var productNameOld='';
    
    var promocionOld='';
    
    
    var comboID='';
    var comboOldID='1';
    for (var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++)
    {
        //line = lines.at(i);
        line = lines[i];

         
        //console.log("Linea Comanda"+ i);
       //console.log(line);
            
        var productName= line.get('product').get('_identifier');
        var pnameLength = productName.length;
        //console.log(productName );

    %>
    
       <%
       var countProm=0;
       var countPromociones2 =0;
       try{
            comboID = line.get('comboId');
            var objprom = line.get('promotions');
             countProm = objprom.length;

            if (countProm>0){
           
                if (indxProm==0){
                    indxProm =i;
                }
                
             var linep = lines[i];
             productNameOld= linep.get('product').get('_identifier');
                        
             printProductMainObject = line.get('promotions');
             nameproductMain = printProductMainObject[0].name; 
             countPromociones2 =  nameproductMain.length;
            
                console.log("****************");
                console.log("productNameOld: "+ productNameOld);
                console.log("nameproductMain: "+ nameproductMain);
                console.log("****************");

                                
                
                            
                if (productNameOld==nameproductMain){
                  %>
                    
                  <%
                  indxProm=0;
                }
            }
            
          }catch(err){
          }
          

          
          if (countPromociones2 ==0 ){

          }
          
             
                          
            if ( comboID != comboOldID){
                comboOldID = comboID ;
                console.log("       *******************Imprimir linea");
                %>
                       
                        ============================================
                      
                <%
            
            }
          
       %>
    
  
      <%
          var productoID = line.get('product').get('id');
          if (productoID!=strMesaCarrionBuff  &&  productoID!=strMesaCarrionMay){
      %>

  <%                            
        if (pnameLength>0){
      %>
            
      
          <%                    
                if(pnameLength >=34) 
                { %>
                    
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(0, 34) %>
                    
                <%
                
                }
                if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength>68) 
                { %>
                     
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                    
                
                <% }
                else if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength<=68) 
                {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                     
                 
                 <%
                 }
                 if (pnameLength>68)
                 {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(68, 34) %>
                         
                
                <%
                 }
                %>
                
                

                <%
                    if (pnameLength >0 && pnameLength<=33){
                %>
                       
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier'))  %>
                      
                <%
                }
                %> 
                
      <%
        }
      %>
      
      
        <%}else{%>

  <%                            
        if (pnameLength>0){
      %>
            
       
          <%                    
                if(pnameLength >=34) 
                { %>
                    
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(0, 34) %>
                    
                <%
                
                }
                if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength>68) 
                { %>
                     
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                    
                
                <% }
                else if(pnameLength >34 && pnameLength<=68) 
                {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(34, 34) %>
                     
                 
                 <%
                 }
                 if (pnameLength>68)
                 {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '     ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier')).substr(68, 34) %>
                         
                
                <%
                 }
                %>
                
                

                <%
                    if (pnameLength >0 && pnameLength<=33){
                %>
                       
                        <%= line.printQty() + ' ' %>
                        <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('product').get('_identifier'))  %>
                      
                <%
                }
                %> 
                
      <%
        }
      %>
            
             
        <%}%>


              <%
                  var V_DES = line.get('description');
                  var desLength = line.get('description').length;
                  if (V_DES!=null && V_DES!=''){
              %>
              
              
                  <%                    
                        if(desLength >=34) 
                        { %>
                            
                                <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_SmallerThan')) +  OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(0, 34) %>
                            
                        <%
                        
                        }
                        if(desLength >34 && desLength>68) 
                        { %>
                            
                                    <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(34, 34) %>
                            
                        
                        <% }
                        else if(desLength >34 && desLength<=68) 
                        {
                         %>
                    
                            
                                    <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(34, 34) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_GreaterThan'))  %>
                             
                         
                         <%
                         }
                         if (desLength>68)
                         {
                         %>
                    
                            
                                    <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')).substr(68, 34) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_GreaterThan'))  %>
                                 
                        
                        <%
                         }
                        %>
                        
                        
        
                        <%
                        if (line.get('description').length >0 && line.get('description').length<=33){
                        %>
                               
                                <%= '   ' + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_SmallerThan')) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(line.get('description')) + OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('Spai_GreaterThan'))  %>
                              
                        <%
                        }
                        %> 
                        
              <%
                }
              %>

          
       <%
            try{
            var printProductMainObjectflag = line.get('promotions');
            //console.log(printProductMainObjectflag);
            
            if (printProductMainObjectflag){
                printProductMainObject = line.get('promotions');
   
                var countProductMain = printProductMainObject.length;
           
                nameproductMain = printProductMainObject[0].name;
                productoPromocion =    nameproductMain; 

                if (productName != nameproductMain)
                {
                               
      %>
                <%                  
                var countlettersProduct= nameproductMain.length;

                if(countlettersProduct >=32) 
                { 
                %>
                    
                        <%= '     --' + nameproductMain.substr(0, 32) %>
                    
                <%
                
                }
                if(countlettersProduct >32 && countlettersProduct>64) 
                { %>
                     
                            <%= '       ' + nameproductMain.substr(32, 32) %>
                    
                
                <% }
                else if(countlettersProduct >32 && countlettersProduct<=64) 
                {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '       ' + nameproductMain.substr(32, 32) %>
                     
                 
                 <%
                 }
                 if (countlettersProduct>64)
                 {
                 %>
            
                    
                            <%= '       ' + nameproductMain.substr(62, 32) %>
                         
                
                <%
                 }
                %>
                
                

                <%
                    if (countlettersProduct >0 && countlettersProduct<=31){
                %>
                       
                        <%= '     --' + nameproductMain  %>
                      
                <%
                }
                %>  
      
      <%
                }

            }
            
            }catch(err){
            }

                                  
          
            
            
      %>
          
    <%
      }
    %>
